metadata.name: Secure MT. WARD Knowledge Key
metadata.description:
We are thrilled to introduce a limited edition series of Knowledge Key NFTs as part of our fundraising initiative to support the MT Ward Primary School in Jamaica. By purchasing the Knowledge Key, you not only support the school but also gain access to an array of exclusive benefits. These include online courses, workshops, and training sessions, as well as airdrop artwork with resale value, token-gated access to workshops, and online financial literacy events focused on Web II/III growth markets for a full year after drop day.

In addition, the Knowledge Key unlocks access to an ecosystem of skilled builders and enthusiasts who are knowledgeable about all things Metaverse. Joining the weekly Metaverse meetups provides a unique opportunity to build community and stay up-to-date on the latest trends and insights in this rapidly growing field. Don't miss the chance to own a unique digital collectible and contribute to a noble cause.
